title: Power numerals in the general counting systems of Micronesia
description: This repository contains linguistic data on the power numerals in the general counting systems of Micronesia that are discussed in the manuscript entitled "Ways of counting in Micronesia", authored by Andrea Bender & Sieghard Beller.
citation: Bender, A., & Beller, S. (subm.). Ways of counting in Micronesia. Historia Mathematica.
